overview: Cali Carter, Shonicee, and Tiffany Taylor are three gorgeous lesbian fuck buddies who show each other an orgasmic good time. Cali Hayes and Cassie Laine have been crushing on each other for a while, and when the clothes come off, steamy sparks fly in this 30 minute lesbian tryst. Lilly Banks and Megan Salinas have been connecting all day, so when one of these Best Friends makes her move, the other doesn't hesitate. Shella Star, Lexi Rose, and Blondie love the notoriety of being the bad girls on the block, but today they're sneaking behind closed doors to get into a different kind of trouble. The newest friend in the trio spends most of this scene getting special treatment in between the other two.
title: Best Friends 2
